ARABIC: وَٱلْجَآنَّ خَلَقْنَٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We created the jinn before out of the fire of a searing wind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As We fashioned jinns before from intense radiated heat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: while We had brought the jinn into being before out of blazing fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and the jinn before (the human being) of smokeless fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And created the jinn before him, from smokeless fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the Jinn, We created earlier from the smokeless flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the jinn We created before, of intensely hot fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the jinn created We before of fire flaming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the jinn did We create aforetime of essential fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the jinn We had created before from flaming fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the Jinn, We had created them afore of the fire of the scroching wind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and We created the jinn earlier, out of a piercing fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the Jinn race, We had created before, from the fire of a scorching wind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the jinn, We created aforetime from the smokeless flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and before him We created the jinn from smokeless fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the jinn We created before, from piercing fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:27] And the jānn, the father of the jinn, namely, Iblīs, We created beforehand — that is, before the creation of Adam — out of the permeative fire, a smokeless fire that can escape through openings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the jinn) the first father of the jinn (did We create aforetime) before the creation of Adam (pbuh) (of essential fire) of smokeless fire.
